skills.skill: ASHRAE and ICC Codes and Standards
Energy Efficiency Standards (RESNET and ENERGY STAR)

duties_responsibilities.duty: Design residential HVAC systems, perform testing, and diagnose mechanical systems
Perform involved and detailed design, equipment selection, mechanical room layout, and interface/coordination with other design disciplines
Perform 2D CAD work and thermal load calculations per ACCA Manual J
Complete HVAC designs, including duct design and layout, specifications, calculations, equipment selection and application as necessary

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in Mechanical Engineering or Architectural Engineering. RESNET Certified Home Energy Rater certification with Associate of Applied Science in HVAC/R may also apply. Pursuing EIT with eventual PE registration.
